author: Fextralife
description:
EMPYREAL Gameplay Overview - Sci-Fi Action RPG Roguelike
Ready to dive into the monolith?👉 https://store.steampowered.com/app/1377700/Empyreal/
Sponsored by:  Silent Games & Secret Mode

In this video, I'm going to be talking about Empyreal, which is an indie action RPG that launches today for PC, Xbox Series X and S, and PlayStation 5. Made by the British developer Silent Games and published by Secret Mode. In Empyreal, players take on the Monolith using different weapon types, with each run altered by Cartograms, which control everything you will experience in your run, from what enemies and bosses you will be facing to how many lives you will get and what loot you will find
